TopicTitle: Anybody wants to compose a KSP-themed opera?

Articles.Content:
I have recently been playing around with the idea of an opera set in the KSP universe. Is anybody else interested?

If yes, we can draw out a rough libretto, maybe some of the most important verses. As I'm not a professional composer, anybody who is good in the field of music is welcome.
Message me for details, please. Composition and BME Education double major here.
